G

generateGesture(boolean) - Method in class Controller.GestureRecord
Creates a GestureController that represents the minimum number of steps required to represent the recording.
GestureController - Class in Controller
A class to create and recognize simple gestures using the relationship between two joints provided by SimpleOpenNI.
GestureController() - Constructor for class Controller.GestureController
Default Constructor: Initializes the control arrays and sets step to 0
GestureController(String) - Constructor for class Controller.GestureController
Constructor sets name to N
GestureController.JointPair - Class in Controller
Class used to hold pairs of joints as all recordings are done in two joint format currently this allows for comparison between linked joints and access to both joints being compared.
GestureController.JointPair(int, int) - Constructor for class Controller.GestureController.JointPair
Initialize First and Second with the values f and s
GestureController.P - Class in Controller
Class to hold various information about joins and relation to each other and the other actions in sequence.
GestureController.P(int, int, Integer, Integer, Integer, boolean) - Constructor for class Controller.GestureController.P
The constructor called by Gesturecontroller.addPoint();
GestureRecord - Class in Controller
Class used to capture and process specific joint relations to generate a gesture from.
GestureRecord() - Constructor for class Controller.GestureRecord
Default Constructor, initializes control vectors
getJoint(int, int) - Method in class Controller.JointRecorder
Retrieves the position of a joint at a given time
getRealCoordinites(SimpleOpenNI, int, int) - Static method in class Controller.GestureController
Retrieves a specified joint of the specified user from a SimpleOpenNI instance and converts the coordinates.
